message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $10,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm not comfortable with the initial price of $10,000. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?  This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $9,000. I'm willing to pay $7,000 for the product. I think this is a more reasonable price considering its value to me.
